Uses of Class
gameobjects.Ball

  • Packages that use Ball 
    Package Description
    brick_strategies
    This package contains various strategies related to brick collisions in a brick-breaking game.
    bricker
    Oversees the overall management and execution of the brick-breaking game.
    game_logic
    This package is responsible for the logic and the functionality of the game.

      Methods in game_logic with parameters of type Ball 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void GameLogic.checkLivesStatus​(Ball ball)
      Checks the status of player lives and handles the restart of the turn if needed.
      private void GameLogic.restartTurn​(Ball ball)
      Restarts the turn by setting the ball's position and velocity to default values.
      void GameLogic.setRandomBallVelocity​(Ball ball)
      Sets a random velocity for the regular ball at the start of the game or after a restart.
      void GameLogic.update​(float deltaTime, Ball ball)
      Main update method called each frame to handle game logic.
